name: nodejs-ci-demo
description: Continuous Integration: Debugging Live Travis CI and CircleCI Builds with SSH Access

scripts.code-coverage: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --recursive -R min && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | codecov
scripts.coveralls: npm run cover -- --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls

author: Ryan C. Martin <ryan.martin@intersystems.com>
